description.value:
A major spider gun is a +2 greater striking weapon. It's a distinct type of martial firearm made from the fangs and spinneret of a Large spider. It deals @Damage[1d10[poison]] damage with a range increment of 30 feet and reload 1. On a critical hit, the venom clings to the target and they take @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} equal to [[/r (1d4+@item.system.damage.dice)[persistent,poison]]]. A spider gun does not add critical specialization effects. The gun can be activated to fire webbing that hampers other creatures.

Activate 1 Interact (conjuration, magical)

Frequency once per round

Effect You fire a mass of webbing at a square within 30 feet. That square becomes covered in webbing for 1 minute. A square covered with the webbing from a spider gun can be cleared by a single attack or effect that deals at least 25 slashing damage or 15 fire damage. A square has AC 5, and it automatically fails its saving throws. The first time each turn a creature in the webbing begins to use a move action or enters the webbing during a move action, it must attempt an @Check[type:athletics|dc:34|name:Spider Gun Athletics|traits:conjuration] check or @Check[type:reflex|dc:34|name:Spider Gun Reflex|traits:conjuration] save against DC 34. On a success, it moves normally through the webbing and clears away the webbing from any squares it enters this turn. On a failure, it treats squares of webbing as difficult terrain this turn, and on a critical failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (DC 34) or destroys the webbing.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials for the spider gun must include the fangs and spinneret of a giant spider or other Large spider.
